active_since.description: __Read-only__ The activation date and time for the child account.

address_1.description: __Filterable__ First line of this child account's billing address.

address_2.description: __Filterable__ Second line of this child account's billing address, if applicable.

balance.description: __Read-only__ This child account's balance, in US dollars.

balance_uninvoiced.description: __Read-only__ This child account's current estimated invoice in US dollars. This is not your final invoice balance. Transfer charges are not included in the estimate.

billing_source.description: __Read-only__ The source of service charges for this account, as determined by its relationship with Akamai. The API returns a value of `external` to describe a child account in a parent-child account environment.

capabilities.description: __Read-only__ A list of the capabilities the child account supports.

city.description: __Filterable__ The city for this child account's billing address.

company.description: __Filterable__ The company name for the owner of this child account. It can't include any of these characters: `<` `>` `(` `)` `"` `=`. You can't change this value yourself. We use it to create the proxy users that a parent account uses to access a child account. Talk to your account team if you need to change this value.

country.description: __Filterable__ The two-letter ISO 3166 country code for this child account's billing address.

credit_card.description: __Read-only__ Information for the credit card you've assigned to this child account.

expiry.description: The expiration month and year of the credit card.

last_four.description: The last four digits of the credit card.

email.description: __Filterable__ The email address of the owner of this child account.

euuid.description: __Read-only__ An external, unique identifier that Akamai assigned to the child account.

first_name.description: __Filterable__ The first name of the owner of this child account. It can't include any of these characters: `<` `>` `(` `)` `"` `=`.

last_name.description: __Filterable__ The last name of the owner of this child account. It can't include any of these characters: `<` `>` `(` `)` `"` `=`.

phone.description: __Filterable__ The phone number for the owner of this child account.

state.description:
__Filterable__ The state or province for the billing address (`address_1` and `address_2, if applicable`). If in the United States (US) or Canada (CA), this is the two-letter ISO 3166 State or Province code.

> ðŸ“˜
>
> If this is a US military address, use state abbreviations (AA, AE, AP).

tax_id.description: The tax identification number for this child account. Use this for tax calculations in some countries. If you live in a country that doesn't collect taxes, ensure this is an empty string (`""`).

zip.description:
__Filterable__ The zip code of this Account's billing address. The following restrictions apply:

- Can only contain ASCII letters, numbers, and hyphens (`-`).
- Can't contain more than 9 letter or number characters.
